snippet: After the Canadian Pacific Railway rejected his plan to change its chief executive, the hedge fund manager William A. Ackman said he would seek to oust the company's board.
abstract: After the Canadian Pacific Railway rejected his plan to change its chief executive, the hedge fund manager William A. Ackman said he would seek to oust the company's board.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA -- The hedge fund manager William A. Ackman said Monday that he would wage a proxy battle to replace the directors and the chief executive of the Canadian Pacific Railway after it rejected his plan to bring in a former rival to run the company.

headline.main: Ackman Plans Proxy Fight at Canadian Pacific
